name: Corb wallet
tagline: Ruby - Blockchain - Bitcoin Core client - password protected access + wallet UI - simple, extendable version
body:
## repo on github 

https://github.com/makevoid/corb_wallet


## download it 

## run it

## understand it (<200 loc)

## extend it!

Use it however you want, this code is unlicensed, the copyright is reserved to all the makers of the dependencies used in this project, all the awesome programming languages and tools.


-----

Find all the infos in the Readme.md

you will need to:

- install bitcoin core (probably starting it with the --prune flag so it will not download the entire blockchain)

then run Corb, and play with the bitcoin core JSON RPC API

https://github.com/makevoid/corb_wallet#bitcoin-core
